page.title: 04LOCAL GOVERNMENT BASSALEG 2
page.content: There are 4 levels of government in Bassaleg.It is part of the Newport West Constituency which has Mr.Mark Robinson as Member of Parliament.It also has representatives on Gwent County Council and on Newport Borough Council.Mr. Gidden is the local County Councillor for Bassaleg and is also Deputy Mayor for 1985/1986.He invited some children to the Newport Civic Centre.Mr.Gidden told the children about his duties and responsibilities.He explained how Newport had asked the Houses of Parliament if they could change Newport from a town to a city.He also said how he had tried to get the Newport buses to come to Bassaleg,but with no success.He also stands in for the mayor,shows VIPs around the Civic Centre and speaks in the Council Chamber.
